page.title: 15Town Councillor
page.content: Our local Councillor visited our school to tell us about her work.She became a councillor because she liked talking about local affairs.She did not work every day but only on demand. She attends about 2 or 3 meetings a week and her duties as town councillor are to look after the interest and properties of people in Newtown. She has been elected Mayor twice in 1977 and 1978. In fact,she was the town's first lady Mayor. Most of the complaints she receives are about housing and some complaints are passed on to the District Council. She told us that the rates would remain the same this year at 3p in the Â£.The council room is called 'The Chamber' and there are 16 councillors and a clerk.
